item.title: Unveiling the intricate nyonya needlework at the Peranakan Museum in Singapore
item.description:
This image, from the Peranakan Museum website, shows an example of Nyonya needlework. The “Nyonya Needlework: Embroidery and Beadwork in the Peranakan World” exhibition is currently on display at the Peranakan Museum in Singapore until March 26, 2017. This exhibition showcases the artistry of Nyonya needlework, a significant aspect of Peranakan Chinese culture. Elaborate curtains, wall hangings, delicate purses, handkerchiefs, and slippers are meticulously crafted with tiny beads, silk, gold, and silver threads...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/unveiling-the-intricate-nyonya-needlework-at-the-peranakan-museum-in-singapore/

item.title: The Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre now offers complimentary Wi-Fi
item.description:
Guests at the Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre (ADNEC) can enjoy free Wi-Fi access through the ‘ADNEC Free Wi-Fi’ network. Humaid Matar Al Dhaheri, Acting Group CEO of Abu Dhabi National Exhibitions Company, stated that providing complimentary Wi-Fi highlights ADNEC’s focus on using technology to improve visitor experiences. This service eliminates the need for visitors to seek out basic internet access, aligning with ADNEC’s commitment to developing its technological infrastructure and enhancing service offerings to meet the changing needs of its stakeholders...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-abu-dhabi-national-exhibition-centre-now-offers-complimentary-wi-fi/

item.title: CEE is ready to showcase gadgets and games
item.description:
The 4th Consumer Electronics Exhibition (CEE) will be held from May 23rd to 26th, 2019, at Suntec Singapore Convention Centre. The event is organized by Exhibits Inc., a subsidiary of Sphere Exhibits, which is the events and exhibitions branch of Singapore Press Holdings. Some of the featured events include: Singapore Robo Fight 2019 (Level 4, Gamex Booth 8601) Attendees can use smartphones to control miniature battle robots and engage in virtual combat...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/cee-is-ready-to-showcase-gadgets-and-games/

item.title: Discover the enchantment of port cities at the Asian Civilisations Museum
item.description:
Source: ACM website. A view of Singapore from Mount Wallich, painted in 1856 by Percy Carpenter, is one of the pieces displayed at the Port Cities: Multicultural Emporiums of Asia, 1500–1900 exhibition. Port cities are vibrant hubs where people from diverse backgrounds converge, bringing with them a rich tapestry of goods and ideas. The special exhibition Port Cities: Multicultural Emporiums of Asia, 1500–1900 at the Asian Civilisations Museum offers a glimpse into this fascinating world through various mediums including photographs, paintings, textiles, luxury items, and everyday objects...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/discover-the-enchantment-of-port-cities-at-the-asian-civilisations-museum/

item.title: Thailand is gaining traction as a top choice for hosting business events
item.description:
Source: TCEB. Thailand, with the Thailand Convention and Exhibition Bureau (TCEB) at the helm, is establishing itself as a prime location for business events. As the Thai government’s primary representative for this sector, TCEB plays a vital role in solidifying Thailand’s leading position in the Asian business events industry and Bangkok’s status as a top-tier destination for international business events. The Thai business events sector is projected to experience robust growth in 2015, anticipating over a million visitors and generating approximately US$3...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/thailand-is-gaining-traction-as-a-top-choice-for-hosting-business-events/
